description: Retrieves the definitions of some or all of the tables in a given Database.

parameters.name: DatabaseName
parameters.description: The database in the catalog whose tables to list. For Hive compatibility, this name is entirely lowercase.

parameters.name: AttributesToGet
parameters.description: Specifies the table fields returned by the GetTables call. This parameter doesn't accept an empty list. The request must include NAME. The following are the valid combinations of values: NAME - Names of all tables in the database. NAME, TABLE_TYPE - Names of all tables and the table types. (string) ---

nested_items.name: TableList
nested_items.description: A list of the requested Table objects.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The table name. For Hive compatibility, this must be entirely lowercase.

nested_items.name: DatabaseName
nested_items.description: The name of the database where the table metadata resides. For Hive compatibility, this must be all lowercase.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description of the table.

nested_items.name: Owner
nested_items.description: The owner of the table.

nested_items.name: CreateTime
nested_items.description: The time when the table definition was created in the Data Catalog.

nested_items.name: UpdateTime
nested_items.description: The last time that the table was updated.

nested_items.name: LastAccessTime
nested_items.description: The last time that the table was accessed. This is usually taken from HDFS, and might not be reliable.

nested_items.name: LastAnalyzedTime
nested_items.description: The last time that column statistics were computed for this table.

nested_items.name: Retention
nested_items.description: The retention time for this table.

nested_items.name: StorageDescriptor
nested_items.description: A storage descriptor containing information about the physical storage of this table.

nested_items.name: Columns
nested_items.description: A list of the Columns in the table.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the Column.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The data type of the Column.

nested_items.name: Comment
nested_items.description: A free-form text comment.

nested_items.name: Parameters
nested_items.description: These key-value pairs define properties associated with the column.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Location
nested_items.description: The physical location of the table. By default, this takes the form of the warehouse location, followed by the database location in the warehouse, followed by the table name.

nested_items.name: AdditionalLocations
nested_items.description: A list of locations that point to the path where a Delta table is located.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: InputFormat
nested_items.description: The input format: SequenceFileInputFormat (binary), or TextInputFormat, or a custom format.

nested_items.name: OutputFormat
nested_items.description: The output format: SequenceFileOutputFormat (binary), or IgnoreKeyTextOutputFormat, or a custom format.

nested_items.name: Compressed
nested_items.description: True if the data in the table is compressed, or False if not.

nested_items.name: NumberOfBuckets
nested_items.description: Must be specified if the table contains any dimension columns.

nested_items.name: SerdeInfo
nested_items.description: The serialization/deserialization (SerDe) information.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: Name of the SerDe.

nested_items.name: SerializationLibrary
nested_items.description: Usually the class that implements the SerDe. An example is org.apache.hadoop.hive.serde2.columnar.ColumnarSerDe.

nested_items.name: Parameters
nested_items.description: These key-value pairs define initialization parameters for the SerDe.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: BucketColumns
nested_items.description: A list of reducer grouping columns, clustering columns, and bucketing columns in the table.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SortColumns
nested_items.description: A list specifying the sort order of each bucket in the table.

nested_items.name: Column
nested_items.description: The name of the column.

nested_items.name: SortOrder
nested_items.description: Indicates that the column is sorted in ascending order ( == 1), or in descending order ( ==0).

nested_items.name: Parameters
nested_items.description: The user-supplied properties in key-value form.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SkewedInfo
nested_items.description: The information about values that appear frequently in a column (skewed values).

nested_items.name: SkewedColumnNames
nested_items.description: A list of names of columns that contain skewed values.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SkewedColumnValues
nested_items.description: A list of values that appear so frequently as to be considered skewed.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SkewedColumnValueLocationMaps
nested_items.description: A mapping of skewed values to the columns that contain them.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: StoredAsSubDirectories
nested_items.description: True if the table data is stored in subdirectories, or False if not.

nested_items.name: SchemaReference
nested_items.description: An object that references a schema stored in the Glue Schema Registry.

nested_items.name: SchemaArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the schema. One of SchemaArn or SchemaName has to be provided.

nested_items.name: SchemaName
nested_items.description: The name of the schema. One of SchemaArn or SchemaName has to be provided.

nested_items.name: RegistryName
nested_items.description: The name of the schema registry that contains the schema.

nested_items.name: SchemaVersionId
nested_items.description: The unique ID assigned to a version of the schema. Either this or the SchemaId has to be provided.

nested_items.name: SchemaVersionNumber
nested_items.description: The version number of the schema.

nested_items.name: PartitionKeys
nested_items.description: A list of columns by which the table is partitioned. Only primitive types are supported as partition keys.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the Column.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The data type of the Column.

nested_items.name: Comment
nested_items.description: A free-form text comment.

nested_items.name: Parameters
nested_items.description: These key-value pairs define properties associated with the column.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ViewOriginalText
nested_items.description: Included for Apache Hive compatibility. Not used in the normal course of Glue operations. If the table is a VIRTUAL_VIEW, certain Athena configuration encoded in base64.

nested_items.name: ViewExpandedText
nested_items.description: Included for Apache Hive compatibility. Not used in the normal course of Glue operations.

nested_items.name: TableType
nested_items.description: The type of this table. Glue will create tables with the EXTERNAL_TABLE type. Other services, such as Athena, may create tables with additional table types.

nested_items.name: Parameters
nested_items.description: These key-value pairs define properties associated with the table.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: CreatedBy
nested_items.description: The person or entity who created the table.

nested_items.name: IsRegisteredWithLakeFormation
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the table has been registered with Lake Formation.

nested_items.name: TargetTable
nested_items.description: A TableIdentifier structure that describes a target table for resource linking.

nested_items.name: CatalogId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Data Catalog in which the table resides.

nested_items.name: DatabaseName
nested_items.description: The name of the catalog database that contains the target table.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the target table.

nested_items.name: Region
nested_items.description: Region of the target table.

nested_items.name: CatalogId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Data Catalog in which the table resides.

nested_items.name: VersionId
nested_items.description: The ID of the table version.

nested_items.name: FederatedTable
nested_items.description: A FederatedTable structure that references an entity outside the Glue Data Catalog.

nested_items.name: Identifier
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the federated table.

nested_items.name: DatabaseIdentifier
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the federated database.

nested_items.name: ConnectionName
nested_items.description: The name of the connection to the external metastore.

nested_items.name: ViewDefinition
nested_items.description: A structure that contains all the information that defines the view, including the dialect or dialects for the view, and the query.

nested_items.name: IsProtected
nested_items.description: You can set this flag as true to instruct the engine not to push user-provided operations into the logical plan of the view during query planning. However, setting this flag does not guarantee that the engine will comply. Refer to the engine's documentation to understand the guarantees provided, if any.

nested_items.name: Definer
nested_items.description: The definer of a view in SQL.

nested_items.name: SubObjects
nested_items.description: A list of table Amazon Resource Names (ARNs).
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Representations
nested_items.description: A list of representations.

nested_items.name: Dialect
nested_items.description: The dialect of the query engine.

nested_items.name: DialectVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the dialect of the query engine. For example, 3.0.0.

nested_items.name: ViewOriginalText
nested_items.description: The SELECT query provided by the customer during CREATE VIEW DDL. This SQL is not used during a query on a view ( ViewExpandedText is used instead). ViewOriginalText is used for cases like SHOW CREATE VIEW where users want to see the original DDL command that created the view.

nested_items.name: ViewExpandedText
nested_items.description: The expanded SQL for the view. This SQL is used by engines while processing a query on a view. Engines may perform operations during view creation to transform ViewOriginalText to ViewExpandedText. For example:
Fully qualified identifiers: SELECT * from table1 -> SELECT * from db1.table1

nested_items.name: ValidationConnection
nested_items.description: The name of the connection to be used to validate the specific representation of the view.

nested_items.name: IsStale
nested_items.description: Dialects marked as stale are no longer valid and must be updated before they can be queried in their respective query engines.

nested_items.name: IsMultiDialectView
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the view supports the SQL dialects of one or more different query engines and can therefore be read by those engines.

nested_items.name: RequestedBy
nested_items.description: The ARN of the user who requested the asynchronous change.

nested_items.name: UpdatedBy
nested_items.description: The ARN of the user to last manually alter the asynchronous change (requesting cancellation, etc).

nested_items.name: RequestTime
nested_items.description: An ISO 8601 formatted date string indicating the time that the change was initiated.

nested_items.name: UpdateTime
nested_items.description: An ISO 8601 formatted date string indicating the time that the state was last updated.

nested_items.name: Action
nested_items.description: Indicates which action was called on the table, currently only CREATE or UPDATE.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: A generic status for the change in progress, such as QUEUED, IN_PROGRESS, SUCCESS, or FAILED.

nested_items.name: ErrorCode
nested_items.description: The code associated with this error.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: A message describing the error.

nested_items.name: RequestedChange
nested_items.description: A Table object representing the requested changes.

nested_items.name: ViewValidations
nested_items.description: A list of ViewValidation objects that contain information for an analytical engine to validate a view.

nested_items.name: Dialect
nested_items.description: The dialect of the query engine.

nested_items.name: DialectVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the dialect of the query engine. For example, 3.0.0.

nested_items.name: ViewValidationText
nested_items.description: The SELECT query that defines the view, as provided by the customer.

nested_items.name: UpdateTime
nested_items.description: The time of the last update.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the validation.

nested_items.name: ErrorCode
nested_items.description: The code associated with this error.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: A message describing the error.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A continuation token, present if the current list segment is not the last.
